name: Random Ransom
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys /  WASD for movement

Right-click for opening treasure chests

Left-click for shooting arrows

Press 'E' to summon a chest

Press 'R' to pay Ransom

Your goal is to pay the ransom, but you are not sure if your ransom will be accepted. The chance of your ransom being accepted increases every time you pay the ransom. You can have money by killing enemies or opening chests. Killing enemies have a chance to drop a chest. But beware not all chest has money inside

Ransom Cost: 50

Key Cost: 20

Arrow Cost: 1

Random Skeleton - Collects chests

30% chance to drop a chest

Radom Zombie - Kills the player

50% chance to drop a chest

Random Alien - Collect dead bodies

90% chance to drop a chest

Random Animal - Kills the player

70% chance to drop a chest
